main event: A civilian observed a white object with a solid center and blurred edges hovering in the sky for about 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a basketball,The object did not move during the observation,The sighting occurred on 10 February 1960,The observer speculated that it might have been related to activities at Cox Airport,No photographs were included in the report.
sighted object: white object with a solid center and blurred edges
